title: Disconnected
body: My friend is constantly disconnected from PVP.Net and has to reconnect every few seconds, he misses a load of queue timers and he can't see chat a lot in lobby, and honestly, it's making playing with him really annoying

replies.body: It sounds like your friend is probably having issues with something blocking or otherwise affecting his connection with our servers. It could be caused by some network or possibly certain firewall settings. Take him through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you two should be able to get him back on the Rift. Hit me back up if he's still having problems!
He said it is a problem with his isp

Ahhhhh that'll do it as well. If that's the case there probably isn't a whole lot we can do since the issue lies with the internet provider. You could have him shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well to see if there's any way we could get his network a smoother link with our servers.
